00116 void svdsort
00117 (
00118         Array2D< double >& umatA,
00119         Array2D< double >& vmatA,
00120         Array  < double >& wvecA
00121 )
00122 {
00123         SIZE_CHECK
00124         (
00125                 wvecA.ndim( ) == 1
00126         )
00127 
00128         unsigned m = umatA.rows( ); /* rows */
00129         unsigned n = umatA.cols( ); /* cols */
00130         double **u = umatA.ptrArr( ); /* m x n matrix */
00131         double **v = vmatA.ptrArr( ); /* n x n matrix */
00132         double  *w = wvecA.elemvec( ); /* n x 1 vector */
00133 
00134     unsigned i, j, k;
00135     double   p;
00136 
00137     for (i = 0; i < n - 1; i++)
00138         {
00139                 p = w [k = i];
00140 
00141                 for (j = i + 1; j < n; j++)
00142                 {
00143                         if (w [j] >= p)
00144                         {
00145                                 p = w [k = j];
00146                         }
00147                 }
00148 
00149                 if (k != i)
00150                 {
00151                         w [k] = w [i];
00152                         w [i] = p;
00153 
00154                         for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
00155                         {
00156                                 p         = v [j] [i];
00157                                 v [j] [i] = v [j] [k];
00158                                 v [j] [k] = p;
00159                         }
00160 
00161                         for (j = 0; j < m; j++)
00162                         {
00163                                 p         = u [j] [i];
00164                                 u [j] [i] = u [j] [k];
00165                                 u [j] [k] = p;
00166                         }
00167                 }
00168     }
00169 }
